summary: This document is an email exchange from August 12, 2019, between Robert Recine of Hotfoil-EHS Inc. and an unidentified recipient (referred to as 'M') regarding an order for two doors, requesting pictures taken on a previous Thursday, and confirming the use of in-stock wicket hinges. The document appears to be routine business correspondence related to a door installation or manufacturing project.

persons.name: Robert Recine
persons.context: Robert Recine is the sender of an email inquiring about an order for two doors and requesting pictures of the doors taken on a previous Thursday.

events.title: Email exchange about door order
events.description: Robert Recine emails an unidentified recipient ('M') to confirm an order for two doors, request pictures taken on a previous Thursday, and confirm the use of in-stock wicket hinges.

locations.name: Hamilton NJ, 08619
locations.context: Location of Hotfoil-EHS Inc., the company Robert Recine works for.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2019, from Robert Recine of Hotfoil-EHS Inc.
The email discusses a business order for two doors and requests pictures taken on a previous Thursday.
The correspondence appears to be routine business communication with no direct mention of Epstein, criminal activity, or other case-related matters.
